official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out the National Aquaculture Act of 1980 for fiscal years 1989, 1990, and 1991.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the National Aquaculture Act of 1980 to extend the authorization of appropriations through FY 1990.
